entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character and is being asked by Ron to follow someone.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is excited to follow Harry's instructions.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is being asked by Harry to follow someone.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: The Malfoys are mentioned as the family of the person Harry wants Kreacher to follow.

relationships.description: Harry asks Ron for information about someone.
Dobby agrees to follow Harry's instructions.
Kreacher is asked by Harry to spy on the youngest Malfoy.
Harry gives instructions to Kreacher about what he should do.
